name: Techbuddies Inc.
tag_list: hp-technical-support, canon-technical-support, dell-technical-support, microsoft-outlook-technical-support, microsoft-technical-support, online-technical-support, apple-technical-support
overview: Techbuddie’s qualified team is comprised of people who have managed and operated large contact center operations for Fortune 50 companies (Microsoft, HP, IBM, and DELL, among others). Our Tech expert have a minimum of 2-3 yearsintensive technical support experience. They are well versed in resolving all common as well as“one-of-a-kind” computer problems including virus intrusions, slow performance, error messages, e-mail client set-up, software installation, configuration requirements and peripheral/devices issues. They demonstrate strong technical skills with all of Microsoft Windows Operating Systems, application support and networking. Techbuddies team has a wide range of certifications that includes, but is not limited to: A+, MCP, CCNA, MCSE, CCNP and Net+ Techbuddie’s interactive solutions will be offered to PC users by phone (1-855-517-2433), the website, Free email, Free live chat, online remote support. Our friendly and affordable services are available to everyone by subscription or per use basis with a host of plans to offer. In today’s rapidly evolving world, users want answers & a resolution to their problem as soon as possible!
